title: Gridstore CEO Named a Top 50 Midmarket IT Vendor Executive for 2015 by Midsize Enterprise Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 7:26 AM   Gridstore, Inc. 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA--(Marketwired - September 21, 2015) - Gridstore Â®, a leader in hyper-converged all flash infrastructure for the Microsoft Cloud-Inspired Data Center today announced that George Symons, Gridstore CEO, has been named to this year's Top Midmarket IT Vendor Executive list, featuring the industry's most influential vendor executives who serve midmarket and midsize customers. The list shines a spotlight on the professionals driving one of the most important customer segments in the industry today. 
Tweet this: @gridstore CEO @gjsymons named a Top Midmarket IT Vendor Executive read all about it @ http://bit.ly/1kVkLu8 
George Symons is a long-term highly successful leader in the storage industry bringing over 20-years of experience to his role as a member of the Gridstore board of directors and its current CEO. George previously served as Chief Strategy Officer at Nexsan, resulting in its acquisition by Imation. Before Nexsan he held executive roles in storage companies including Xiotech Corporation (COO), EvoStor (CEO), Yosemite Technologies (CEO), EMC (CTO Information Management), and Legato (CTO, VP of Development and Product Management). 
Throughout his career in high-tech, George has established a reputation as a thoughtful compassionate executive who exemplifies what it means to be a "student of the industry." He leads by example and is constantly challenging himself and his teams to stay abreast of emerging technologies, market trends and the mid-markets' customers' needs and pains and striving to address these in a positive pro-active manner. Witnessed by his current executive team, most of whom have worked with him in numerous previous companies, his style of total transparency, trust and praise engenders an extremely high level of loyalty. 
"I am extremely honored to once again be recognized by The Midsize Enterprise Summit team as one of the top executives in the storage marketplace," said George Symons, CEO, Gridstore. "Receiving this award validates our value proposition for our partners and customers in the mid-market, delivering innovative hyper-converged solutions that aid them implementing a next generation infrastructure to meet their needs today and into the future. Our HyperConverged All-Flash Infrastructure (HCI) solutions that are purpose-built for the Microsoft Cloud-Inspired Data Center are well suited to address the challenges of this market segment by providing them the ideal high-performance, scalable solutions that are easy to manage and reduce overall TCO. Our HCI provides them an ideal platform for infrastructure refreshes and specific workloads such as VDI, SQL Server, Private Cloud, and ROBO." 
"The executives named and the companies they represent serve the midmarket with unwavering commitment, and are dedicated to creating solutions that meet the unique needs of this market," said Robert C. DeMarzo, Senior Vice President of Strategic Content, XChange Events. "Our Midsize Enterprise Summit is an ideal venue to honor these deserving leaders, and we congratulate each executive on their success." 
The Top 50 Midmarket IT Vendor Executive list will be honored at the Midsize Enterprise Summit (MES), September 20-22, 2015 at the Hyatt Regency Century Plaza, Los Angeles, CA. In addition, the list of executives will be featured in a slideshow on CRN.com, a leading source for IT industry news. Visit http://www.xchange-events.com/mes50 for access to the slideshow.
